model_answer:
The events that directly set up the monetary challenge in event 7 are:

A: Event 1 — He holds up and opens a box of homeopathic sleeping pills while stating he took all 32 at once and calling them a scam with no active ingredient.
C: Event 6 — He explicitly issues a challenge to manufacturers and retail stores who profit from these products.

Option B provides additional context but does not directly set up the monetary challenge. Option D mentions his frustration about people's perception of homeopathy but does not specify any monetary challenge.
The answer is C: Event 1 — He shows a box of homeopathic sleeping pills and says he took all 32; he claims most homeopathic remedies have no active ingredients and act like sugar pills or water.
